newsitem.title: USA: Ichat Inc raises more than $5.25 mln in financing.
newsitem.headline: Ichat Inc raises more than $5.25 mln in financing.

text.p: Ichat Inc on Tuesday it closed a third round of financing, raising more than $5.25 million.
A spokesman declined to specifiy the amount of the financing, saying only it was more than the $5.25 million the Internet software developer raised in two previous rounds.
General Electric Co's GE Capital Services led the financing, with Merrill Lynch, ONSET Ventures and Ziff Brothers Investors participating.
Ichat said it will use the money to expand its product offerings and market reach.
The spokesman also said Steven Smith, a managing director of GE Capital's equity group, joined its board of directors.
